tool_description: An API shows all news related to MIRROR
name: MIRROR Live
title: MIRROR Live

api_list.name: Get all MIRROR news
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mirror-live.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mirror-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get MIRROR news from specific media

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mirror-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mirror-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
